name: PAT_PRIM_LOC
description: The PAT_PRIM_LOC table contains the Primary Location information for your patients over time.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s encryption utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each line of Primary Location information for the patient.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location record for the Primary Location.

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: The date from which the location is in effect as the member�s Primary Location.

columns.name: TERM_DATE
columns.description: The date after which the location ceases to be the member�s Primary Location.
